price: Anaasε wͻn wͻ (anyame) ahokafoͻ? Ɛneε ma wͻnfa wͻn (anyame) ahokafoͻ no mmra, sε wɔyε nokwafoͻ ampa a.
arabic: أَمۡ لَهُمۡ شُرَكَآءُ فَلۡيَأۡتُواْ بِشُرَكَآئِهِمۡ إِن كَانُواْ صَٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: am lahum shurakāu falyatū bishurakāihim in kānū ṣādiqīna
